script: There is a High Street in the center of my hometown.
About 3 km North of the High Street there is a Museum
About 3 km West of the Museum there is a Hospital
About 2 km West of the Hospital there is a Library
I visited Retail Area, which is 1 KM, North from Library.
And finally there is Park which is South from Retail Area and 2 KM from it.
Given the points of interest that I have told you about, how would I travel from High Street to Park following those interesting points?
expected_responses:
(Just an example, if exact instructions are followed)
From High Street, go 3km North to Museum.
From Museum, go 3km West to Hospital.
From Hospital, go 2km West to Library.
From Library, go 1km North to Retail Area.
From Retail Area, go 2km South to Park.
